medical_history.chief_complaint: Congenital heart disease, dextrocardia, and coarse facial appearance.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: At 3 days old, computed tomography showed dextrocardia. She had a history of growth retardation. Developmental milestones were normal; she started walking and talking at the age of 1 year.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cardiac operation for ventricular septal defect at 5 months old. No bleeding problem up to the age of 10 years.
